channel.title: Game stopping bug
channel.description:
Hello
I've come across a bug that prevents me from continuing. Namely, when starting the underground fan, it gradually builds up speed and... then the program crashes...

item.title: Game stopping bug
item.dc:creator: MrTAToad
item.description:
Fortunately I didn’t have to restart too far back. Very annoying though…

Read full topic

item.title: Game stopping bug
item.dc:creator: Ed1
item.description:
Yeah this was mentioned on the bugs thread, apparently it’s a physics bug - smash up all the boxes around the fan, or move them out of the way so they wont touch the fan - as long as the boxes themselves aren’t in contact with the fan while it is spinning up, you’ll be fine. The forklift pallets won’t crash the game though.

Read full topic
